assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Kelly Ormond was a paid consultant for Navigenics in 2007–2009, during which time the original SGHI data was obtained, but she was not involved in the creation or oversight of the original Bloss et al. (CitationRef removed) study or its data in any way.
